question: Which bank has launched SmartHub Merchant Solutions 3.0?
explanation:
HDFC Bank has recently announced the launch of SmartHub Merchant Solutions 3.0. This solution allows merchants and self-employed professionals to open a Current Account with the Bank instantly.
It also allows the user to accept and make payments in an instantaneous manner. SmartHub 3.0 will be available in app based, web based and in a range of PoS devices.
